title: Error code 004 Issue
body: every time I try to download the 7.6 patch it gives me the 004 error code and says "the patching failed and we don't know why" Anyone have a solution?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Prepaidthrone,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5kdBZGbv,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-06T14:56:47.098+0000)
>
> every time I try to download the 7.6 patch it gives me the 004 error code and says &quot;the patching failed and we don&#039;t know why&quot; Anyone have a solution?

I have a solution: use a triple contour integral and make sure to use the Karl Fischer tensor in order to streamline the process.

This error code is the updated client's way of suggesting a network problem failing to reach the patching server.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get up to date!  Let me know if you have any questions!
